snippet.title: Mario & Sonic at the Pyongyang 2018 Olympic Winter Games trailer (Fangame)
snippet.description:
Here it is! The first Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games fangame as seen in the F3 and I'm trying to make it as good as it can be!
Of course, everything isn't final and the graphics will be improved in the future releases.
I'll do my possible to release it this summer but it's over half-complete so it's very probable!

Mini-Credits:
- My sister for some background
- SpeendlexMK2 for the logo
- Various spriters & musicians (Will give full credits in-game)
- Me for everything else
NOTE: I do not own either the rights of Mario, Sonic or the Olympic Games. It is an free fangame to show my love for this series and is meant to be seen as a tribute.
